message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its unique value, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can reach an agreement closer to my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $14,000.
Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the price.  While I value your interest, $14,000 is significantly below its true worth.  Could you meet me halfway at $17,000?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your position on the matter. I would like to counter with a price of $15,500.
